Come explore and check out videos that highlight the importance of sleep as well as tips to help you sleep!  TIPS:  路 While sleeping new information moves from short to long term storage  路 Helps to maintain a calmer more even mood  路 Helps to control appetite  路 Humans should have at least six hours a night for maximum health  Check out these links for more tips and resources!
